body.name: PerioClear Alcohol Free Mouthwash 16oz | Naturally Whitens Teeth | Freshens Breath | Removes Plaque | Minimizes Dry Mouth
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 13 mins
features: Show your teeth some love with this natural mouthwash, which comes in Coolmint, Wintermint, and Cinnamint flavors. This complete oral care product is gluten-free, fluoride-free, soy-free, sodium-lauryl-sulfate-free, and most importantly; alcohol free!

Launched in 1972 from Frank Sr. and Josephine D’Amelio’s garage, Nature’s Answer was founded to create high-quality herbal extracts and nutritional products that support, promote, and enhance healthy lifestyles, filling a void in the natural products marketplace at the time

As one of America’s largest and oldest manufacturers of nutritional supplements, Nature’s Answer is an FDA registered, pharmaceutically licensed herbal manufacturing and quality control facilities, and has one of the most impressive herbariums in the U.S.

Nature’s Answer holds its liquid herbal extracts and nutritional products to the highest purity standards with uncompromising manufacturing practices perfected over its nearly 50-year history, upheld through three generations of the D’Amelio family and still going strong today.
During the summer months products may arrive warm but Amazon stores and ships products in accordance with manufacturers' recommendations, when provided.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bio Pro, For Periodontal Health PerioClear Natural Cleansing Mouthwash Concentrate - Fresh Mint Flavor. Fluoride-Free, Alcohol Free, No Artificial Preservatives, Colors, Dyes, or Sweeteners. Dentist Formulated All-Natural Formula - No Sodium-Lauryl-Sulfate. Patented Phytoplenolin Dentist formulated Bio-Pro Natural Brightening Mouthwash contains Phytoplenolin, a patented herbal extract that has been shown in independent laboratory studies to promote cell vitality. Soothing wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, are combined with CoQ10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to promote tissue and gum wellness. Smile Naturally All herbs are carefully selected, tested and verified, identified for authenticity and finely milled, allowing faster absorption by the body. These supplements offer the ideal way to experience the benefits of high quality Standardized herbs. NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, sweeteners, or preservatives. Gluten-Free. Fluoride-Free. Soy-Free. SLS-free.

Dentist Formulated Bio-Pro is formulated by Dentists to ensure the most optimal Oral Hygiene. Made in the USA Bio-Pro products are Gluten Free, Made in the USA and Never used on any Animals. Quality you can trust. Naturally Sourced Ingredients Each ingredient is traced and sourced from the highest quality from around the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First thing that has helped in 20 yrs of trying everything! First use made a HUGE difference! If your gums bleed and hurt no matter how or what you do try this. I also use the concentrate in my water flosser, huge difference!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Save some cash
reviews.reviewText: Just read all the other reviews to find out how good this product is. And if you decide to buy it, read on to save half the cost. I bought this product and when it was time to replenish, saw another bottle by the same manufacturer Nature's Answer. The other product is called Perio Brite. I looked over every single ingredient, and guess what? They're exactly the same! The only difference I could find in the two products was the label. I guess the one is "Doctor recommended" and the other isn't??? I've used both and they taste and work exactly the same. I'm not sure what kind of whacked out conspiracy this is, but unless I'm really missing something, the exact same product cost twice as much for a different label. So answer the question: do I want to pay half as much for the same product? Ummm... Yes???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non Toxic, Effective
reviews.reviewText: When the nutritionist had recommended this product there were some issues with inflammation around several areas of the gums. I followed the directions on the bottle (which are written clearly, easy to follow) and by the next dental visit the inflammation had gone completely. Just as with anything else in life in order to achieve desired results it is necessary to be consistent. The recommendation is to rinse for 30 - 60 seconds after having brushed with Periopaste Toothpaste. In my experience it is best to begin with a 30 second rinse as the product may feel a little intense. (This sensitivity may be caused by either the presence of inflammation~~~or perhaps it is a matter of getting used to the product). It is important to note that this mouthwash is fluoride free, preservative free, alcohol free, and sodium lauryl sulfate free. Is it expensive? Things are relative. Since this mouthwash was recommended by the nutritionist and my holistic dentist (during separate consultations) I feel confident that PerioClear Organic Alcohol Free Mouthwash 16 oz is safe to use without hidden nasties contained therein. Again...is it too expensive? In this case you get what you pay for. What goes into the mouth affects the body's cells and tissues...ultimately your overall health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great natural product, works great!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a natural product with no artificial ingredients, no harmful sweeteners (saccharin, aspartame, etc), and something that just works safely. Well, this is it! It has a pleasant herbal flavor, but not overpowering and doesn't have that "medicine" taste. It works quickly, and you only need a little bit. About a half cap will do the job, so while it might seem expensive it lasts a long time. I like it enough that sometimes I just skip the toothpaste and brush with the PerioClear. The ingredients are all responsible and safe, no garbage like the supermarket brands. Here's a complete list of ingredients from the package:INGREDIENTS: Phytoplenolin® (Centipeda Cunninghamii Extract), Bio-Chelated® Extracts of Calendula Flower, Chamomile Flower, Echinacea Purpurea Tops, Gotu Kola Herb, Prickly Ash Bark, Olive Leaf, Grapefruit Seed, Black Walnut Green Hulls, Green Tea Leaf, Goldenseal Rhizome, Essential Oils of Peppermint, Oregano, Rosemary, Lavender, Cinnamon, Clove, Lemon Balm, Eucalyptus, Thyme, Bio-SaponinTM (Quillaia, Yucca Extract, Sarsparilla Root Extract, Wild Yam Root Extract), Xylitol, Folic Acid, Aloe PhytogelTM (Aloe Barbadensis), Coenzyme Q10, Chlorophyll.Base Ingredients: USP Purified Water, Vegetable Glycerin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flavor is not to my liking
reviews.reviewText: I had thought that the dominant flavor would be mint, as mint is strong and it's the featured flavor. Nope, just taste likes oregano. Can't get over that. For something so expensive, I expected a more pleasant flavor. Would not purchase again.
